TOOLTIP.URL: ※Please input the confirmed URL by all means! Do not do as it is of the temporary URL of at the time of assign request!
TOOLTIP.ESTIMATED_ADD_AMT_GMS_JPY: Project with advertising and circulation of no use⇒0 input
TOOLTIP.MAIL_MAGAZINE: Material here⇒http://rap/sites/ichiba/hensei/news/DocLib/planning application/About Mail magazine original document setting method.pptx
TOOLTIP.DISTRIBUTION_PURPOSE: Select at the time of issuing the no. of leopon. Material here⇒http://rap/sites/ichiba/hensei-kanri/makeaplan/data/ About the setting method of Delivery purpos.pptx
TOOLTIP.ASSET_CREATION_INS: Attach the work instructions which used the work instructions template.
TOOLTIP.MENU_ID: In case of multiple, input by punctuation /(Slash).
TOOLTIP.REQUEST_REMARKS: ※In advance discuss with PM about the project involved in the development of JS . Flash and others.
TOOLTIP.IS_TEIREI: This cannot be modified after registering the event plan.
TOOLTIP.EVENT_TYPE: Seisaku type events are just for assignment purpose and hence will be excluded from KPI calculation.
TOOLTIP.LINK_ID: Link ID is required to display historical KPI data of the event.
TOOLTIP.CAMPAIGN_NAME: Use the selection only for Hensei created campaigns.

VALIDATION.DUE_DATE_REQUIRED: Teirei event registration due date is required when start is mentioned.
VALIDATION.DUE_DATE_INVALID: Teirei event registration due date should be greater than or equal to corresponding month start date and less than or equal to it's next month registration start date.
VALIDATION.START_DATE_REQUIRED: Teirei event registration start date is required when due is mentioned.
VALIDATION.START_DATE_INVALID: Teirei event registration start date should be less then or equal to corresponding month due date and greater than or equal to it's previous month due date.

REGISTRATION.DIFFERENCE_COUPON_LP: Confirmed that there is no difference in the coupon setting and LP description
REGISTRATION.COUPON_NAME_VAL: Coupon Name should have minimum 2 characters
REGISTRATION.COUPON_DETAILS_1_COUPON_USAGE_CONDITION_: Usage condition 1: Amount / number condition is required
Usage condition 3: Max usage count is required
Usage condition 4: User usable number is required
Usage condition 5: Combination with other coupons
Usage condition 5: Combination with other coupons is required
Usage condition 6: Target product is required
REGISTRATION.POINT_ADDITION_PLANNED_DATE: Point addition planned date (15th of next month to principle campaign end date)
REGISTRATION.POINT_VALIDITY_PERIOD: Point validity period (Point usage end date. Generally next month end after addition)
REGISTRATION.NOTIFICATION_PAGE_UP_DATE: Notification page up date/ distribution calendar up date
REGISTRATION.NOTIFICATION_PAGE_URL: Notification page URL (this value is invalid only for point up ceremony)
REGISTRATION.CAMPAIGN_ID_RELATED_INFORMATION: 【Only point up ceremony】Campaign ID related information
REGISTRATION.BANNER_UP_TARGET_URL: Banner up target URL (PC/SP/MB) (For Shop distribution etc.)
REGISTRATION.OTHER_ENTRY_INFORMATION: Other entry information (when there are multiple entries)

VALIDATION.CAMPAIGN_PLANNING_DEPARTMENT: Please select a Campaign Planning Department
VALIDATION.CAMPAIGN_NAME_AlPHA_NUMERIC: Campaign Name should be Alpha Numeric
VALIDATION.ALL_MEDIA_NAME: All Media Names have already been selected.
VALIDATION.CAMPAIGN_LEADER: The Campaign Approval leader is required.
VALIDATION.POINT_PROCESS_STATUS: Please select a Point Process Status
VALIDATION.CAMPAIGN_START_DATE: The Campaign Start Date is required.
VALIDATION.CAMPAIGN_END_DATE: The Campaign End Date is required.
VALIDATION.COUPON_USAGE_PERIOD_START_DATE: The Coupon usage period(Start Date) is required
VALIDATION.COUPON_USAGE_PERIOD_END_DATE: The Coupon usage period(End Date) is required
VALIDATION.CAMPAIGN_CONTENT: Campaign content can be of max length 500
VALIDATION.COMMENT: Comments can be of max length 500
VALIDATION.FILE_FORMAT_INVALID: Only file with XLS and XLSX extension is allowed.
VALIDATION.PARENT_CAMPAIGN_NAME: The Parent Campaign Name is required.
VALIDATION.PARENT_CAMPAIGN_NAME_INVALID: Please enter valid parent campaign name.
VALIDATION.COUPON_PROCESS_STATUS: Please select a Coupon Process Status
VALIDATION.TARGET_SHOPS_LIST: The Target shops list is required.
VALIDATION.NO_OF_COUPONS: The No of Coupons is required.
VALIDATION.NO_OF_COUPONS_RANGE: Can accept values only from 1 to 10.
VALIDATION.NO_OF_COUPONS_LESS_THAN_ALREADY_REGISTER: The value cannot be lesser than the registered coupon details count.
VALIDATION.CAMPAIGN_DATE_FORMAT_INVALID: Invalid date or format entered. It should be yyyy/mm/dd HH:mm.

TOOLTIP.CAMPAIGN_NAME: Once registered, Campaign Name cannot be changed.
TOOLTIP.CAMPAIGN_TYPE: Once registered, Campaign Type cannot be changed.
TOOLTIP.MEDIA_NAME: Once registered, selected Media Names cannot be un-selected.
TOOLTIP.NOTE_MEDIA_NAME: Note: If there is one or more events associated with a Media Name, then it cannot be un-selected.
TOOLTIP.LINK_LABEL: This Link Label is must to show the continuity of the KPI.Example: If you set this value as "SPSale" in the 2019/07 Super Sale then in the next 2019/08 Super Sale also set this "SPSale" value.
TOOLTIP.CAMPAIGN_CONTENT: The usage of 「～」「Half byte katakana」in【user rule, notification page publishing】is strictly prohibited.
TOOLTIP.NOTIFICATION_PAGE_UP_DATE: The target of the notification page up date is the Wednesday other than national holiday and registered before 2 business days.
TOOLTIP.ENTRY_INFORMATION_SUBSCRIPTION_START_DAT: Due to test period, set this 1 business day before the Campaign start date (except Saturday Sunday and national holiday)
TOOLTIP.ENTRY_INFORMATION_SUBSCRIPTION_END_DATE: Register as Camapaign end date + 1 minute (if start time is 9:59 the entry will be 10:00)
TOOLTIP.ENTRY_INFORMATION_ENTRY_NAME: Less than full byte 80 characters: Campaign name (YYYY/MM/DD 〜 MM/DD) 【Privilege point: addition till MM/DD】
TOOLTIP.ENTRY_INFORMATION_ENTRY_URL_PCMS: Only half byte alphanumeric. Arbitrary YYYYMMDD ※ and「 _ 」 usage is prohibited.
TOOLTIP.COUPON_CAPITAL: Select the party that will cover the coupon capital expense
TOOLTIP.NOTIFICATION_POSSIBLE: Select the notification possible or not in the shop side
TOOLTIP.COMMENT: Coupon promotion G entry area (Mention the reason for No publication or the publication date)
TOOLTIP.COUPON_CAMPAIGN_NAME: (Enter the official campaign name used externally)Enter the generic campaign name of the coupon campaign. In one campaign if multiple coupons to be published then use same campaign name.
TOOLTIP.TARGET_SHOPS: Example: Service coupon target all shops, Service coupon target all shops (except some shops), OOGenre related shops.
TOOLTIP.TARGET_USERS: Example: New user of Rakuten Ichiba *If no restriction mention as (Rakuten member)
TOOLTIP.TARGET_SHOPS_LIST: If not all shops target, attach the shops list that is applicable to the coupon
TOOLTIP.TARGET_SHOPS_LIST_UPDATE_DATE: It is not the list creation date of individual campaign incharge, it is the update date of the list that is sent to the Coupon team. *Normally update is 15th of every month
TOOLTIP.AD_AVAILABLE: Check this if there is paid Ad in the campaign.
TOOLTIP.CAMPAIGN_PAGE_URL_SP: Enter if there is SP specific campaign page
TOOLTIP.PCID: PCID is necessary to be entered to link this campaign with PCMS system.
TOOLTIP.NO_OF_COUPONS: Enter the number of coupon details that will be registered. (Range: 1 to 10)

POPUP.APPROVAL_NEEDED_MSG: Changed contents need Approval again. Do you want to proceed?
POPUP.APPROVAL_NOT_NEEDED_MSG: You are trying to change the All approved record contents. Do you want to proceed?
POPUP.CAMPAIGN_EXISTS_ON_DATE: The following campaigns have the same start date and end date. Do you want to proceed?
POPUP.PARENT_CAMPAIGN_ACTIVE: The parent campaign is not active.

COUPON_DETAILS_TOOLTIP.COUPON_CODE: Enter like ****-****-****-**** format of 16 characters. (Enter English letters in Caps / numbers with hyphen separation)
COUPON_DETAILS_TOOLTIP.AQUISITION_STARTDATE: Enter if it is different from Coupon usage period
COUPON_DETAILS_TOOLTIP.AQUISITION_ENDDATE: Enter if it is different from Coupon usage period
COUPON_DETAILS_TOOLTIP.AMOUNT_USAGE_CONDITION: Eg: Can be used if bought over 3,000 yen / Can be used if over 5 items are bought (Insert comma)
COUPON_DETAILS_TOOLTIP.MAX_COUNT_USAGE_CONDITION: Example: Only for first 1000 / Blank when No limit (register with space)
COUPON_DETAILS_TOOLTIP.USABLE_NUMBER_USAGE_CONDITION: Example: One person till 3 times / One person many times.
COUPON_DETAILS_TOOLTIP.COUPON_COMBINATION_USAGE_CONDITION: Specify either Combination possible or Combination not possible
COUPON_DETAILS_TOOLTIP.TARGET_PRODUCT_USAGE_CONDITION: Specify either as All products or Target product
COUPON_DETAILS_TOOLTIP.NOTIFICATION_BANNER_USERNAME: If the banner is uploaded to http://kakunin.rakuten.ne.jp/ then enter the confirmation user name (Example：sample)
COUPON_DETAILS_TOOLTIP.NOTIFICATION_BANNER_PASSWORD: If the banner is uploaded to http://kakunin.rakuten.ne.jp/ then enter the confirmation password（Example：sample99)
COUPON_DETAILS_TOOLTIP.NOTIFICATION_BANNER_PRECAUTION: Enter the precaution instruction related to the banner ※Will be published in the campaign page.
COUPON_DETAILS_TOOLTIP.NOTIFICATION_BANNER_TAG: Enter if there is any specific tag during the notification banner publishing. ※Will be entered in the campaign page.
COUPON_DETAILS_TOOLTIP.NOTIFICATION_BANNER_RMAIL_PC: Enter if there is any specific tag during the notification banner publishing. ※Will be entered in the campaign page.
COUPON_DETAILS_TOOLTIP.NOTIFICATION_BANNER_RMAIL_FP: Enter if there is any specific tag during the notification banner publishing. ※Will be entered in the campaign page.

TOOLTIP.URL_TO_CONFIRM_MB_TOOLTIP: Write path to confirm the page like Teamsite path or real URL.

TOOLTIP.TEXT_10_TOOLTIP: Required for TOP text box request ※Request to use Katakana to represent point relation like 「Point」.
TOOLTIP.AD_OFFER_AMOUNT_TOOLTIP: Ad Offer Amount, Sufficiency Rate, Ad Sales Amount(forecast)
TOOLTIP.AD_SALES_AMOUNT_FORECAST_TOOLTIP: Ad Offer Amount, Sufficiency Rate, Ad Sales Amount(forecast)
TOOLTIP.TOP_BANNER_PUBLISHING_EXPECTATION_TOOLTI: Please check this when you expect TOP banner publishing. TOP banner publishing will not be considered if you don't check this.
TOOLTIP.IS_INCENTIVE_AVAILABLE_TOOLTIP: When [Yes] is selected,  Important Campaign check request related JIRA Ticket URL entry field will be displayed.
TOOLTIP.JIRA_TICKET_URL_TOOLTIP: Enter the JIRA Ticket URL for Important Campaign check request, according to the guideline of the UXP Top Banner guideline.
TOOLTIP.IS_TOP_BANNER_PUBLISHING_PLANNED_TOOLTIP: Please check this if you have already discussed and got promise from UXP about the TOP banner publishing for this event. If not then please don't check this.
TOOLTIP.TOP_BANNER_PUBLISHING_DATES_TOOLTIP: Like Seasonal events, if you have many events starting at the same time and have the same publishing period then please check this without fail.
TOOLTIP.TOP_BANNER_PERSONALIZED_CONTENTS_TOOLTIP: Please check this without fail when you want to use personalization.

TOOLTIP.TOP_BANNER_SP_TOOLTIP: Required for SP TOP banner,　Size　200ｘ200

TOOLTIP.PERSONALIZED_SP_IMG1_TOOLTIP: Required for SP TOP banner,　Size　200ｘ200
TOOLTIP.PERSONALIZED_TB_IMG1_TOOLTIP: Required for TB TOP banner,　Size　314ｘ314

TOOLTIP.TOP_BANNER_QUALITY_CHECK_TOOLTIP: Please check for which quality check is OK.
TOOLTIP.WORK_STATUS_TOOLTIP: Status for Media update person in-charge. If you are not person in-charge of Media update then please don't touch this!
